title: PLEASE CAN ANYONE IDENTIFY THIS FONT
content:
PLE

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014232337im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nn_4433.jpg)
ASE PLEASE HELP ME WITH THIS FONT NAME
author: zolaman

comments.content:
Hi Azeez, welcome to Typophile. For future ID requests, you should post them on the **[Type ID board](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014232337/http:/typophile.com/typeid)**. I will move this thread for you.

(and it has been my experience that posts titled in capital letters get significantly less attention)

well, to me it appears to be this font:

[http://www.ffonts.net/Sansation-Bold.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014232337/http:/www.ffonts.net/Sansation-Bold.font "http://www.ffonts.net/Sansation-Bold.font")

with minor alterations to create the logo. (assuming it is one, or some piece of art)  
I do realize the source seems iffy, but to me and by the bio of the designer this seems that it may be free because it is incomplete and basically, amateur/student work.
